mil7.8.2:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘kalayasassa dve angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani dve angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.8.2:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogino yogavacarassa manasam yoniso manasikarena apitam vamati.
mil7.8.2:1.4: Idam, maharaja, kalayasassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.8.2:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, kalayaso sakim pitam udakam na vamati;
mil7.8.2:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena yo sakim uppanno pasado, na puna so vamitabbo ‘ularo so bhagava sammasambuddho, svakkhato dhammo, suppatipanno sangho’ti.
mil7.8.2:2.3: ‘Rupam aniccam, vedana anicca, sanna anicca, sankhara anicca, vinnanam aniccan’ti yam sakim uppannam nanam, na puna tam vamitabbam.
mil7.8.2:2.4: Idam, maharaja, kalayasassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
